title: Manikyam Jhumkas - Emerald & Diamond Bell Earrings
features: Exquisite open-work filigree design in the Jhumka bell, adorned with sparkling diamonds. Features a central Emerald above each jhumka, showcasing a classic color contrast. The delicate pearl drops (గుత్తులు) add movement and grace. Traditional Hyderabadi polish provides a rich, lustrous finish. The earring design is inspired from temple jewelry designs.
occasions: or any grand celebration. Can also be styled for contemporary Indo-Western outfits.
description: Handcrafted by skilled artisans, these Jhumkas embody timeless South Indian elegance. The rare combination of emeralds, diamonds, and pearls makes them a truly unique piece. The intricate filigree work showcases exceptional craftsmanship and cultural heritage, ensuring it will be cherished for generations. These jhumkas offer an excellent blend of tradition and modern design.
